name: It's Not You, It's Me.
description:
It's hard to separate sometimes. It's not you, it's me, is a short-story platformer about the separation of a couple. It can be beaten in under a minute(not including cutscenes) and was a blast to make!

This game was made in 9 days for  Gdevelop GameJam #3, with the theme Separation. You play as Unamed Character and use your heart to traverse the levels. I really wanted to make more  for this one, I feel like what little narrative there is was rushed a bit. I'm still extremely proud of it though. This game is my fourth, and, marks 6 months of game dev progress and Gdevelop usage. I hope you'll enjoy it.

Notes

It's not stated, but, when you're a little red heart, you can move with WASD.

Jumping while on the corner of the ground may cause you to use your double jump, there may also be some minor issues with the audio. 

Play on Liluo.io
